name: Alien army creator
description:
Alien army creator is an incremental game with the aim to build your alien army an invade planets to conquer all life in the universe.

Instructions how to download:

1. Press download and wait for it to finish

2. Go into windowsNoEditor and click on IncrementalGame

3.Extract all the files then go back into folder and click on IncrementalGame again

4. If a warning pops up click more info and run anyway.

5. Wait for game to load and make sure to full screen the game first before playing 

How to play:

1. Click on the alien in the middle to earn aliens(points)

2. Click on the side buttons for upgrades or to start an invasion

3. Press on the spaceships in the invasions to progress

4. In the top left there is an option to play music while playing

Notes: After each invasion, progress is reset which we didn't have enough time to change.
